missing.game.items.movable

Class Movable

  • java.lang.Object
    • missing.game.items.Item
      • missing.game.items.movable.Movable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, WorldTile.TileObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Money, Resource, Usable

    public abstract class Movable
extends Item
    Represents an item that can be moved/carried in the game. Movable items can have their location changed.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface missing.game.world.nodes.WorldTile.TileObject

      • Movable

        public Movable(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String description,
               java.awt.Point worldLocation,
               java.awt.Point tileLocation,
               int amount,
               int size)
        Creates a new instance of a Movable item
        Parameters:
        name - name of Movable
        description - description of the Movable item
        worldLocation - the section of the world the Movable item is located
        tileLocation - the tile inside a worldLocation the Movable item is located
        size - weight of the Movable item

      • performAction

        public void performAction(Player player)
                   throws GameException
        This method attempts to add the resource into the player's pocket or bag. If there is not enough room, then it throws an exception.
